data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This property of selective absorption of light at specific bands is important in astronomy because it allows an astronomer to determine the chemical properties of a distant object. A ____, ____ example, will ____ a ____ with ____ or ____ absorption ____, ____ are ____ by ____ quantities ____ different ____ on ____ surface. The science of recording and measuring these lines is called spectroscopy.
data.partBlankContent: This property of selective absorption of light at specific bands is important in astronomy because it allows an astronomer to determine the chemical properties of a distant object. A st__, f__ example, will rad____ a spec____ with str___ or we__ absorption ba___, wh___ are deter_____ by t__ quantities o_ different ga___ on i__ surface. The science of recording and measuring these lines is called spectroscopy.
data.answer: 这种特定波段选择性吸收光的特性在天文学中很重要，因为它可以让天文学家确定一个遥远物体的化学性质。例如，一颗恒星会辐射出具有强或弱吸收带的光谱，这是由其表面不同气体的数量决定的。记录和测量这些线的科学叫做光谱学。
